item.title: Ancient Wells Under Threat: BJP Leaders Protest Against Encroachments in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gawal: Gadwal district is witnessing growing concerns over the illegal encroachment and destruction of ancient wells, which have historically served as vital water sources for the region. BJP leaders, led by district president Tapala Ram Anjaneyulu, submitted a petition to District Collector BM Santosh, demanding immediate action to protect the historic wells from being buried under unauthorized construction.
The Issue: Burial of an Ancient Well Near Ananta Function Hall
BJP leaders allege tha...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
